definition: Euclid/abbr. for 歐幾里得|欧几里得
(used for transliteration)/old variant of 謳|讴[ou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐洲|欧洲[Ou1 zhou1]/surname Ou
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
clan name/maiden name
Euclidean geometry

sentences.english: Euclidean quantum gravity applies the superposition principle to the entire universe.
sentences.chinese: 欧氏量子重力将叠加原理套用到整个宇宙。

sentences.english: Euclidean quantum gravity does not build in a notion of causality.
sentences.chinese: 欧氏量子重力并没有预先置入因果律。

sentences.english: I have used Euclidean Distance but you could use any.
sentences.chinese: 我用欧氏距离，但你可以使用任何。

sentences.english: In the third chapter, we discuss the annealing process on the Euclidean space.
sentences.chinese: 第三章，我们考虑了欧氏空间上的退火过程。

sentences.english: The result using GTI model is somewhat inferior to Euclidean distance.
sentences.chinese: 使用GTI模型的结果比欧氏距离的要差。

sentences.english: for example, Euclidean space is invariant under rotations and translations.
sentences.chinese: 例如欧氏空间在旋转和平移下都不会改变。

sentences.english: Character classification is realized by combining the Euclid distance and the Mahalanobis distance based on the projection coefficients.
sentences.chinese: 在此基础上，组合欧氏距离和马氏距离实现字符分类。

definition: boss's son/young master
learned person/expert in a certain field/abbr. for 大方之家[da4 fang1 zhi1 jia1]
the Zhou family (household, firm etc)/Jow-Ga Kung Fu - Martial Art
a branch of the Xianbei 鮮卑|鲜卑 nomadic people
the Hong family (household)/Hung Gar Kung Fu - Martial Art
Charles Messier (1730-1817), French astronomer who catalogued nebulas and galaxies
Roche/F. Hoffmann-La Roche Ltd
offspring a famous family (idiom); good breeding/blue blood
see 月氏[Yue4 zhi1] and 閼氏|阏氏[yan1 zhi1]
clan name/maiden name
(literary) to run friskily (of a horse)/to raise/to hold high
rich patriarchal family/aristocracy
distinguished or prominent family/influential clan (old)
Tengjia township in Rongcheng 榮成|荣成, Weihai 威海, Shandong
wife's parents' home
the Korean Yi or Lee Dynasty (1392-1910)
collateral relative (descended from a common ancestor but through different lines)
